column4: Ok, I just got Ubuntu in the mail, and I can't seem to get it to install. I have the CD in the drive and I restarted and shut down but it just starts up my old OS again.
check your BIOS (press escape/f2 etc.) and see if your CD drive is above the HD in the startup list
or you may have an option for a one-time-boot menu by pressing F12 (if it's a dell, and possibly others)
